column4: so I run Gentoo and want to try out Ubuntu MOblin remix on my netbook. However, there is no usb-creator package for gentoo so how do I copy the ISO to a flash?
I tried unetbootin to create the flash but that didn't appear to work

copying the iso is one thing, installing the boot sector to make it bootable is the delicate part. you can try to run syslinux manually, otherwise there are many scripts around which does these kind of things
